"Photography Rooms": "\"Photography Room\" is a system that allows you to play in a Room specialized for taking screenshots and recording videos."

"Photography Rooms can only be created in Exploration and Combat Sections. In a Photography Room, no enemies or Tames will appear, and no Trials or PSE Bursts will occur.

You can also access special Photography Room Settings from the Party Commands menu, which allow you to set your preferred weather and time of day."

"To play in a Photography Room, set a Room Password and check the \"Photography Room\" option.

If you tell other players the Room Password, they will be able to join you."
